info.title: Sage Accounting API - Status Codes & Types
info.description: Documentation of the Sage Business Cloud Accounting API.

contact.name: Sage Business Cloud Accounting API Team

tags.name: Quick Entry Types
tags.description: Sales or purchase quick entries are either of the type INVOICE or CREDIT_NOTE. This API allows only SHOW and INDEX actions on this resource.

tags.name: Artefact Statuses
tags.description:
An artefact is a general term for one of (purchase or sales) invoice, credit note, quick entry, quote, estimate or corrective invoice (Spain only). The artefact status describes the life cycle of such an object. It can be one of UNPAID, PART_PAID, PAID, VOID, DRAFT, DISPUTED, DECLINED or PRO_FORMA. Most of these statuses can not be set directly, but are the result of a separate operation, e.g. creating a payment for an invoice may change the status from UNPAID to PAID.

Related Guide: Key Concepts: Artefact Statuses

tags.name: EU Goods Services Types
tags.description: Line items on artefact objects (invoice, credit note, quick entry, quote, estimate or corrective invoice) can be specified as being either of type GOODS or SERVICES. Although the name suggests it is only for EU contacts, it applies to cross border trades in general. This API allows only SHOW and INDEX actions on this resource.

### Access Control Restrictions

Requires the authenticated user to have any mentioned role in one of the listed areas:
* Area: `Sales`: Read Only, Restricted Access, Full Access
* Area: `Purchases`: Read Only, Restricted Access, Full Access
